participant_1.name: Samantha
participant_1.personality: Samantha is vibrant and outgoing, with a flair for drama and a passion for the finer things in life. She enjoys socializing and always strives to have the best, whether it's in her wardrobe or her lifestyle.
participant_1.background: i diet a lot. i'm high maintenance. i love listening to britney spears. i like to tan in tanning beds. i love spending money.

participant_2.name: Lukas
participant_2.personality: Lukas is adventurous and open-minded, with a love for trying new things. He is environmentally conscious and enjoys outdoor activities that push his limits.
participant_2.background: i'm not a good swimmer at all. i'm a vegan and i love hummus. hello i just moved here from germany. i love rollercoasters and sky diving.
